title: Crazyflight Volleyball Shoes
subtitle: Men's Volleyball
description: Controlling the court isn't always enough in indoor sports. So when you need to dominate the air too, pull on these adidas Crazyflight shoes. Sitting within a stabilizing EVA frame, their Boost midsole provides ignition for big jumps and cushioning for graceful landings. Lightweight and foot-hugging, the mesh upper has a TPU-reinforced midfoot so you stay supported when you're back on the deck.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas Primeknit upper; Textile lining; EVA stabilization frame; Boost midsole; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GX3748
colors: Cloud White / Grey Three / Cloud White

title: Ultraboost 22 COLD.RDY Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description: Winter can be your favourite season to run. Just lace up these adidas COLD.RDY running shoes and head out confidently into the rain, slush or snow. The upper is insulated for warmth and comfort in low temperatures. Your footing feels secure on slippery streets thanks to a grippy Continental™ Wintergrip™ Rubber outsole. Energy-returning Boost and a Linear Energy Push system keep you going longer.
details: Sock-like fit; Lace closure; Insulated textile upper; Linear Energy Push system; Boost midsole; Weight: 301 g (size UK 5.5); Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel 32 mm / forefoot 22 mm); Continental™ WinterGrip™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Blue Tint / Silver Metallic / Blue Rush; Product code: GX8032

title: X Speedportal.4 Flexible Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Children Soccer
description:
Good players create time and space. Great ones leave them both behind. Unlock multidimensional speed in adidas X Speedportal. These juniors' soccer cleats were created for quick cuts and match-turning speed on firm ground, hard ground and artificial grass. Soft and durable, their synthetic upper helps you keep the ball close when you're in top gear.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Soft synthetic upper; TPU flexible ground outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Clear Aqua / Power Blue / Solar Yellow; Product code: GW8498
colors: Core Black / Solar Red / Solar Green

title: Gamemode Knit Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Soccer
description:
Let your feet do the talking on the pitch. Express your beautiful game in adidas Gamemode with a choice of styles and designs. The soft, stretchy knit textile upper on these cleats makes for easy entry and game-changing stability. The versatile outsole will help you show your skills on both firm ground and artificial grass. The graphics are inspired by soccer's biggest stage.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; TPU heel clip; Textile lining; Hybrid outsole for firm and artificial surfaces; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Rich Purple / Cloud White / Ruby Red; Product code: GV6865

title: 4DFWD Pulse 2 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description: Run smooth with these adidas shoes, created using state-of-the-art 3D printing technology, with incredible smoothness, guiding your strides for a more fluid run. The 4DFWD heel is angled to increase impact absorption. Working together with the EVA midsole, this unique design translates into a smooth heel transition at the moment of touchdown while the 3 layered upper is engineered for seamless stretchable support for lateral and linear movements. A rubber outsole provides superb traction for a confident stride. Made in part with recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Textile lining; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Carbon / Cloud White; Product code: GY1650
colors: Off White / Zero Metalic / Bliss Orange

title: Top Ten RB Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
These adidas high top shoes got their name from — no surprise — being reserved for the top ten players in basketball way back in the day. Far from the hardwood now, they still pulse with that B-ball DNA that made people first take notice. Easy colors on the soft, full grain leather upper add to the vintage vibes. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Full grain leather upper; Textile lining and sockliner; Rubber midsole and outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Collegiate Navy / Grey One / Grey One; Product code: FZ6023
colors: Cloud White / Dark Blue / Night Marine

title: Solarcontrol Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description:
From training runs to race day, go the distance with confidence. These running shoes provide extra stability with adidas LEP 2.0, designed to help guide each foot strike and propel you forward. The mesh upper offers targeted lockdown zones for added support while maintaining breathability. BOOST cushioning delivers energy return and comfort to keep you feeling fresh from start to finish.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Linear Energy Push system; Dual-density EVA platform; BOOST midsole; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 33 mm / forefoot: 23 mm); Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Magic Mauve / Cloud White / Pulse Magenta; Product code: GY1657

description: Who wants to stay cooped up inside through the weekend? Call up a few friends, lace on these adidas shoes and get out there. A design made for B-ball players and adopted by skaters, these sneakers' canvas upper and vulcanized sole make them the perfect combo for city explorations. An updated take on the 3-Stripes pays tribute to your adventurous spirit.

description: Explore more. Made for adventure riding across trails and abandoned dirt roads, these adidas Five Ten mountain bike shoes have the lightweight, cushioned feel of a trail runner for exploring off the bike. Stealth® Phantom rubber adds the pedal-gripping power to ride any trail. Neoprene cuffs seal out dirt and gravel. A breathable upper keeps feet comfortable through it all. Take the path less traveled.

description:
These adidas sneakers are living their best life. Rooted in running but with one foot (pardon the pun) firmly in the realm of fashion, the Ultraboost DNA is built for whatever your day brings. adidas PRIMEKNIT wraps the foot for a supportive fit, and BOOST provides instant comfort and endless energy return for a smooth ride.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description:
Disney and adidas pair up for these signature shoes, starring one of the most beloved villains in animation history. Both sides of the sockliner depict Disney's Ursula in bright full-color style. Her trademark phrase shows up in metallic gold on the lining for an unexpected touch and a reminder of the character's unforgettable song. Smooth faux leather pops shades of purple against black, creating a sleek look for swagger every day. The heel patches are a reminder that "It's not easy being green," so it's important to do our best for the planet.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

colors: Pantone / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
The Trailcross Clip-In is the latest addition to the Five Ten Trailcross family, designed from the ground up with adventure at its core. Packed with all the Trailcross technology, this latest model provides clip-in performance on the bike and all-day comfort when hiking off the bike. The addition of the Clip-In model takes the range to the next level, making our award-winning design available to clip-in pedal users for the first time.

The Trailcross range was built from the ground up, starting with the Five Ten dotted outsole with the addition of a recessed cleat to clip into compatible pedals. This was then refined with hiking in mind, bringing the additional ridged grip to the toe and heel. The Trailcross Clip-In is a lightweight and breathable shoe. With the need for the shoe to provide all-day comfort but also deliver across the contact points on and off the bike, the mid-sole EVA technology provides the necessary toe flex for hiking, without losing the all-important stiffness. The Trailcross Clip-In utilizes a hook and loop closure for added security and to reduce heel lift. Clip-in pedal users no longer need to compromise when planning their next adventure.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure with hook-and-loop top strap; Textile upper with abrasion-resistant overlays and reflective details; Light and breathable feel; Impact-resistant toe box; Lightweight EVA midsole; Weight 15.3 ounces (size 9); Stealth® Marathon rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Orbit Green / Carbon / Pulse Lime; Product code: GZ9849
colors: Core Black / Grey Three / Red

description:
A peek into what's ahead inspired these adidas shoes for juniors, delivering high-concept design and high-performance wearability. They play on the idea of transparency between today and tomorrow, reflected in a BOOST outsole that promises energy return and instant comfort with each step. Confident edge shows up with 3-Stripes along the sides, and a bold lace overlay adds high-contrast energy. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Synthetic outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White; Product code: GW1475

description:
Lightweight and comfortable, the Terrex Speed Ultra is packed with innovations that give athletes an edge. Tom Evans tested different versions of the shoe for two years and helped us craft it to completion. He then took it for a spin and won the Tarawera race wearing it. He thinks it's magic, but it's just skill paired with science. 

This shoe brings together many innovations to support you on your journey. Inspired by gravel bikes, the lug pattern of the outsole offers great traction. Combining two types of lightweight materials, the midsole cushions feet and gives energy back without compromising on stability. The tongue and heel tabs are padded for comfort and the upper is light, breathable and drainage-ready.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings; Perforated tongue; BOOST midsole and Lightstrike cushioning; Reflective print; Weight: 8.6 ounces; Continental™ Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Almost Lime / Pulse Lime / Turbo; Product code: H03193
colors: Core Black / Crystal White / Turbo

description: Lace up and take your run beyond the tarmac. These adidas Terrex trail running shoes are built for comfort and durability in rough terrain. Lightstrike cushioning and a rock protection plate keep you cruising through rugged, uneven ground with confidence. A Continental™ Rubber outsole adds exceptional grip across roots, rocks and dirt, wet or dry. Synthetic overlays extend durability, and a gusseted tongue seals out debris to keep you on the move in any terrain.
details: Lace closure; Synthetic upper with TPU protection layer; Textile lining; Lightstrike cushioning; Gusseted tongue; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Wonder Steel / Magic Grey Met / Pulse Lilac; Product code: GW5554
colors: Wonder Steel / Magic Grey Met / Pulse Lilac

description: Dennis Busenitz knows detail and the Busenitz Vulc II is a testament to his craft and unique approach to skateboarding and design. The Busenitz Vulc II takes his design insights and specifications and creates a streamlined version of his classic pro model. Featuring the staple feel and fit the Busenitz franchise was founded on, the Dennis vulc version features a slimmed-down suede construction with Adituff toe reinforcement, molded Adiprene sockliner, Geofit collar and Geoflex outsole for grip and control. Mixing abrasion-resistant technology for skateboarding and a vulcanized construction, the Busenitz Vulc II provides lightweight durability and boardfeel for modern skateboarding.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Suede upper with Geofit padded collar; Abrasion-resistant Adituff toe; Molded heel clip; Adiprene cushioning; Vulcanized Geoflex outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Collegiate Navy / Blue Bird; Product code: GY6906
colors: Cloud White / Collegiate Navy / Blue Bird

description:
If you're looking for a running shoe that can elevate any outfit, the adidas by Stella McCartney Solarglide Running Shoes might just be it.

The lightweight Primeknit upper made in part with recycled materials will keep your feet snug on any run around 10k. The striking speed-inspired cage is made from bio-based EVA. The cage is built to give you extra support with every step, and it gives the shoes their characteristic Stella McCartney look. 

Whether you wear these shoes when you go for a run or throughout your day, you'll feel energized with every step thanks to the flexible outsole and BOOST midsole. They complete any outfit as a statement piece.

description:
Basketball has evolved into a hybrid, position-less game. Gone are the days of a designated ball-handler or a post-up player — today's stars can do it all. These adidas basketball shoes keep that intent in mind, giving you the freedom of super-lightweight Lightstrike cushioning and the lockdown needed to cut and change directions at high speed.

The Candace Parker Collection from adidas Basketball highlights the other-worldly work ethic of "Ace." The color scheme on the midsole and signature graphics on the heel webbing serve as a reminder that if you want to dominate the hardwood like Candace you have to put the work in from sunrise to sunset.
